realEstate.label: Real Estate Disputes
realEstate.description1: Real estate is an important asset in our lives, and real estate-related disputes require complex and professional legal knowledge. Sejoong Law Firm professionally resolves all real estate-related legal issues including real estate contracts, ownership disputes, lease disputes, and construction disputes.
realEstate.description2: We adopt a systematic approach to resolve real estate disputes. First, we understand the overall situation of the case through consultation with the client, and thoroughly collect related documents and evidence. Then, we present the optimal solution through legal review and seek the possibility of adjustment through negotiation. If negotiation is not possible, we protect the client's rights through litigation.

divorce.label: Divorce/International Divorce
divorce.description1: Divorce is an important turning point in life, and legal issues that arise during the divorce process require careful and professional approach. Sejoong Law Firm professionally resolves all divorce-related legal issues including judicial divorce, consensual divorce, property division, alimony, and child custody.
divorce.description2: Especially in international divorce cases, the situation is more complex due to different legal systems and language barriers between countries. We have extensive experience in divorce cases between nationals and foreigners, and accurately understand and apply international private law and family laws of each country. We also comprehensively resolve subsequent issues such as child custody, visitation rights, and property division.

judicial.desc: Divorce procedures through trial when consensual divorce is not possible

inheritance.label: Inheritance Disputes
inheritance.description1: Inheritance is property inherited from ancestors, but disputes that arise during the inheritance process require careful approach as they involve emotional conflicts and legal complexity among family members. Sejoong Law Firm professionally resolves all inheritance-related legal issues including inheritance property division, reserved portion return claims, and inheritance recovery claims.
inheritance.description2: To resolve inheritance disputes, we first accurately identify the scope of inheritance property and calculate each heir's inheritance share. We support reserved portion return claims when there are reserved portion right holders, and proceed with inheritance recovery claim lawsuits when inheritance rights are violated. We also support establishing inheritance plans and writing wills at the pre-inheritance stage. We provide legal advisory for inheritance tax reduction to minimize the client's burden.

division.title: Inheritance Property Division
division.desc: Fair division and division negotiation of inheritance property

reserve.title: Reserved Portion Return Claim
reserve.desc: Protection of reserved portion right holders' rights and return claims

recovery.title: Inheritance Recovery Claim
recovery.desc: Recovery claim lawsuit for inheritance right violations

will.desc: Establishment of inheritance plans and will writing at the pre-inheritance stage

tax.title: Inheritance Tax Reduction
tax.desc: Legal advisory and planning for inheritance tax reduction

international.title: Domestic and International Inheritance Cases
international.desc: Processing of inheritance cases when there is overseas property

traffic.label: Traffic Accidents
traffic.description1: Traffic accidents are unexpected accidents that can happen to anyone, and proper legal response after an accident is important. Sejoong Law Firm professionally resolves all traffic accident-related legal issues including traffic accident damages, insurance claims, and fault ratio disputes.
traffic.description2: We immediately investigate the accident scene and collect evidence to accurately identify the cause of the accident. In calculating fault ratios, we accurately apply the Road Traffic Act and related precedents to derive results favorable to the client. We also demonstrate expertise in negotiations with insurance companies to help clients receive maximum insurance benefits. We also proceed with additional compensation claims when sequelae or disabilities occur.

damages.title: Damage Claim
damages.desc: Property damage and mental damage compensation claims due to traffic accidents

insurance.title: Insurance Claim
insurance.desc: Insurance claims and dispute resolution such as auto insurance and accident insurance

fault.title: Fault Ratio Dispute
fault.desc: Accident cause analysis, fault ratio calculation, and dispute resolution

criminal.title: Criminal Punishment Response
criminal.desc: Response to criminal punishment such as Road Traffic Act violations and negligent injury

sequelae.title: Sequelae and Disability
sequelae.desc: Traffic accident sequelae and disability grade calculation, additional compensation claims

investigation.title: Accident Investigation
investigation.desc: Accident scene investigation, evidence collection, and accident cause analysis

industrial.label: Industrial Accidents
industrial.description1: Industrial accidents are legal issues that occur when workers suffer work-related accidents. According to the Industrial Safety and Health Act and the Industrial Accident Compensation Insurance Act, workers have the right to receive appropriate compensation. Sejoong Law Firm professionally resolves all industrial accident-related legal issues including industrial accident recognition, disability grade determination, and compensation claims.
industrial.description2: In industrial accident cases, we first accurately identify the circumstances of the accident and determine whether it is a work-related accident. To recognize work-related accidents, we must accurately meet the recognition requirements for each type such as work-related diseases, work-related accidents, and commuting accidents. We support claims for various benefits (medical benefits, suspension benefits, disability benefits, nursing benefits, survivor benefits, etc.) under the Industrial Accident Compensation Insurance Act, and apply for re-examination when there are objections to disability grade determination.
industrial.description3: We also proceed with damage claims against employers to protect workers' rights to the maximum. In addition to compensation under the Industrial Accident Compensation Insurance Act, civil damage claims are possible for damages caused by the employer's intent or negligence. We do our best to protect workers' rights and interests.

recognition.title: Industrial Accident Recognition
recognition.desc: Application for work-related accident recognition, objection application, and re-examination request

disability.title: Disability Grade Determination
disability.desc: Disability grade determination, objection application, and re-examination request

compensation.title: Compensation Claim
compensation.desc: Claims for various benefits such as medical benefits, suspension benefits, and disability benefits

investigation.title: Accident Investigation
investigation.desc: Investigation of accident circumstances and evidence collection

insurance.label: Insurance Litigation
insurance.description1: Insurance is an important means to prepare for unexpected accidents or illnesses, but cases occur where insurance benefits are refused or unfairly reduced. Sejoong Law Firm professionally resolves all insurance-related disputes including life insurance, property insurance, auto insurance, fire insurance, and accident insurance.
insurance.description2: We accurately interpret insurance terms and protect clients' rights through litigation when insurance companies unfairly refuse to pay insurance benefits. In particular, we actively utilize precedents favorable to policyholders regarding insurance benefit payment refusals due to violation of the duty to inform before contract. In interpreting insurance terms, it is a principle to interpret them unfavorably to insurance companies, so we actively utilize this to protect clients' rights.
insurance.description3: We also request recalculation when there are objections to insurance benefit calculation, and proceed with litigation if necessary. We can also claim delay damages for insurance benefit payment delays. We support the entire process from negotiation with insurance companies to litigation so that clients can receive maximum insurance benefits.

refusal.title: Insurance Benefit Payment Refusal
refusal.desc: Objection application and litigation against insurance benefit payment refusal

reduction.title: Insurance Benefit Reduction
reduction.desc: Objection application and litigation against unfair insurance benefit reduction

interpretation.title: Contract Interpretation
interpretation.desc: Interpretation of insurance terms and insurance benefit calculation

delay.title: Delay Damages
delay.desc: Delay damage claim for insurance benefit payment delays

tax.label: Tax Litigation
tax.description1: Tax litigation is litigation that resolves disputes regarding tax imposition and collection between tax authorities and taxpayers. Sejoong Law Firm professionally handles all tax-related litigation including income tax, corporate tax, value-added tax, comprehensive real estate tax, inheritance tax, and gift tax.
tax.description2: We support clients from the tax investigation stage to prevent unfair tax imposition in advance. We prevent unfair dispositions by tax authorities during the tax investigation process, and proceed with objection applications and review requests for investigation results. When review requests are dismissed or unsatisfactory, we file administrative litigation to protect clients' rights.
tax.description3: We accurately understand and apply tax laws and related precedents to derive results favorable to clients. In particular, unclear provisions of tax laws should be interpreted favorably to taxpayers as a principle, so we actively utilize this. We also support establishing tax plans at the pre-tax investigation stage to minimize tax burden.

response.title: Tax Investigation Response
response.desc: Legal advisory and response during tax investigation process

objection.title: Objection Application
objection.desc: Objection application and review request for tax investigation results

lawsuit.title: Administrative Litigation
lawsuit.desc: Administrative litigation to cancel tax imposition dispositions

planning.title: Tax Planning
planning.desc: Establishment of tax plans at the pre-tax investigation stage

general.label: Family/Civil/Criminal/Administrative
general.description1: Sejoong Law Firm provides professional services in various legal fields such as family, civil, criminal, and administrative. Expert lawyers in each field cooperate to solve clients' complex legal problems.
general.description2: In family litigation, we handle all family law-related issues such as divorce, inheritance, adoption, parental rights, child custody, and visitation rights. Family litigation requires careful approach as it involves emotional conflicts among family members, and we strive to derive the best legal results while considering clients' emotions.
general.description3: In civil litigation, we resolve various civil disputes such as contract disputes, damages due to illegal acts, debt collection, real estate disputes, and construction disputes. Civil litigation is important for evidence collection and legal interpretation, so we derive results favorable to clients through thorough prior preparation.
general.description4: In criminal cases, we protect defendants' rights as defense attorneys and proceed with arguments to claim innocence or reduce sentences. In administrative litigation, we proceed with litigation seeking cancellation or invalidation of administrative dispositions, and accurately apply administrative procedure laws and various administrative laws and regulations to protect clients' rights.

advisory.description1: For successful corporate operations, it is important to prevent and manage legal risks in advance. Sejoong Law Firm provides professional advisory services to solve corporate legal issues. We support all areas including corporate legal affairs, contract review, and regulatory compliance.
advisory.description2: We follow a systematic process to solve corporate legal issues. First, we understand and analyze the status of corporate legal issues. Then, we conduct legal review through review of related laws and precedents, and present solutions to minimize legal risks. We support and monitor the execution of presented solutions and provide continuous legal advisory and post-management.

mna.label: Mergers & Acquisitions (M&A)
mna.description1: Mergers and acquisitions (M&A) are important strategies for corporate growth and market competitiveness. Sejoong Law Firm provides M&A-related legal services. We support the entire process including corporate valuation, contract drafting, and permit procedures.
mna.description2: In M&A cases, we first conduct valuation and due diligence of the target company. We identify legal, financial, and tax risks, and draft merger and acquisition contracts and stock transfer contracts. We handle necessary permit procedures such as Fair Trade Commission reporting and foreign investment reporting, and present M&A-related tax planning and tax reduction measures. We also resolve labor issues that arise during mergers and acquisitions and support corporate restructuring such as mergers, divisions, and conversions.

overseas.label: Overseas Investment
overseas.description1: Overseas investment is an important strategy for strengthening corporate global competitiveness and market expansion. Sejoong Law Firm provides legal services related to overseas investment. We support the entire process including overseas investment reporting, foreign investment company establishment, and overseas branch establishment.
overseas.description2: In overseas investment cases, we first analyze the legal system and investment environment of the target country. We accurately understand different legal systems and investment regulations by country to minimize investment risks. We support foreign investment reporting and foreign investment company establishment under the Foreign Investment Promotion Act, and also support overseas branch or local corporation establishment.
overseas.description3: We present tax planning and tax reduction measures related to overseas investment, and provide legal advisory to prevent conflicts with local laws. We also support compliance with foreign exchange transaction law regulations related to overseas investment, and support resolution through international arbitration or local litigation when overseas investment-related disputes occur.

finance.label: Real Estate Finance
finance.description1: Real estate finance is a method of financing for real estate development and investment. Sejoong Law Firm provides legal services related to real estate finance. We provide legal advisory on various real estate finance products such as real estate mortgage loans, project financing, real estate funds, and REITs.
finance.description2: In real estate finance cases, we first calculate the value and collateral value of real estate. We accurately evaluate the market value and collateral value of real estate to calculate appropriate loan limits. We review and draft loan contracts with financial institutions and negotiate loan conditions, interest rates, and repayment conditions.
finance.description3: For project financing, we review both project contracts and financial contracts to increase the success possibility of the project. For real estate funds, we support compliance with regulations under the Collective Investment Act and also present tax planning related to real estate finance. We also support resolution through litigation when real estate finance-related disputes occur.

indirect.label: Indirect Real Estate Investment
indirect.description1: Indirect real estate investment is a method of investing indirectly in real estate without directly investing. Sejoong Law Firm provides legal services related to indirect real estate investment. We provide legal advisory on various indirect real estate investment products such as real estate funds, REITs, and real estate development project investments.
indirect.description2: In indirect real estate investment cases, we first analyze the value and profitability of the target real estate. We comprehensively analyze the market value, rental profitability, and future value appreciation potential of real estate to evaluate investment value. We support compliance with regulations under the Collective Investment Act and Capital Markets Act, and review and draft investment contracts and operation contracts.
indirect.description3: We present tax planning and tax reduction measures related to indirect real estate investment, and provide legal advisory for investor protection. In particular, for collective investment organizations, there are strict regulations for investor protection, so we support accurate compliance. We also support resolution through litigation when indirect real estate investment-related disputes occur.

duration.answer: It varies depending on visa type and country, but generally takes 2 weeks to 3 months. For urgent cases, expedited processing service is available.

registration.question: How do I get an alien registration card?
registration.answer: You must apply to the Immigration Office within 90 days of entry. You can apply by preparing the necessary documents.

extension.question: When should I apply for stay period extension?
extension.answer: You can apply from 4 months before the stay period expires. You must apply before expiration.

rejection.question: Can I reapply if my visa is rejected?
rejection.answer: Yes, you can resolve the rejection reason and reapply. Getting help from a professional lawyer increases the chances of success.

reserve.answer: A reserve portion is a system that guarantees heirs a certain percentage of their statutory inheritance share. If the reserve portion is infringed, you can claim a return.

tax.answer: Yes, inheritance tax can be reduced by establishing an appropriate inheritance plan before inheritance. Please consult with an expert lawyer.

qualification.question: What are the qualifications for permanent residency application?
qualification.answer: You can apply for permanent residency if you have legally stayed for more than 5 years and meet certain income requirements. Please check the detailed requirements through consultation.

citizenship.question: How do I acquire citizenship?
citizenship.answer: After acquiring permanent residency, you can apply for citizenship if you stay for a certain period and meet requirements such as Korean language ability and social integration program completion.

duration.question: How long does an immigrant visa application take?
duration.answer: It varies depending on the immigrant visa type, but generally takes about 6 months to 1 year. Complex cases may take longer.

reapplication.question: My visa was refused. Can I reapply?
reapplication.answer: Yes, you can reapply after resolving the refusal reason. Accurately analyzing and supplementing the refusal reason and reapplying increases the approval possibility.

choice.question: Which is better, administrative appeal or reapplication?
choice.answer: It depends on the refusal reason. Reapplication is faster if it can be resolved through document supplement, and administrative appeal is effective if it is a legal interpretation issue.

timing.question: How long should I wait after visa refusal to reapply?
timing.answer: It depends on the refusal reason, but generally you can reapply immediately. However, it is important to reapply after resolving the refusal reason.

what.question: What is a Waiver?
what.answer: A waiver is a system that allows entry even if there is an entry ban reason, if there are special circumstances. You must apply to the immigration office and receive approval.

refusal.question: What should I do if my waiver application is refused?
refusal.answer: You can analyze the refusal reason, supplement additional documents and reapply, or cancel the refusal disposition through administrative appeal.

duration.question: How long does a waiver application take?
duration.answer: Generally takes about 3 to 6 months. It may vary depending on the complexity of the case.

timing.question: When should I apply for stay permit extension?
timing.answer: It is recommended to apply at least 2 months before the stay period expires. Applying after expiration may result in disadvantages.

change.question: Is stay qualification change possible?
change.answer: Yes, stay qualification change is possible if certain requirements are met. For example, it is possible to change from student visa to work visa.

overstay.question: What should I do if I have overstayed?
overstay.answer: You must immediately report to the immigration office and apply for extension. The longer the overstay period, the greater the disadvantage, so quick response is important.

deportation.answer: You must immediately consult with a lawyer to establish a response plan. You can prevent deportation through waiver application or litigation.

required.question: Is foreign investment reporting mandatory?
required.answer: Yes, investments above a certain amount must be reported under the Foreign Investment Promotion Act. Failure to report may result in disadvantages.

permanent.question: Can I get permanent residency through foreign investment?
permanent.answer: You can apply for permanent residency (F-5) through investment above a certain amount. It varies depending on the investment amount and requirements.

procedure.question: What is the procedure for foreign investment company establishment?
procedure.answer: Procedures such as corporation establishment, foreign investment reporting, and foreign exchange transaction reporting are required. Please consult with an expert lawyer to proceed.

qualification.question: What are the qualifications for overseas Korean visa (F-4) application?
qualification.answer: A person who held Korean nationality or their direct descendants can apply for F-4 visa if they meet certain requirements.

employment.question: Can I work with an overseas Korean visa?
employment.answer: Yes, F-4 visa allows free employment activities. You can work without separate work visa application.

benefit.question: Are there benefits for overseas Korean investment?
benefit.answer: Some tax benefits and simplified procedures may apply for overseas Korean investment. Please consult with an expert lawyer.

q1.question: What is a visa issuance certificate?
q1.answer: It is a document required to obtain a visa from the embassy before entering Korea. It is issued by the Immigration Office.

q2.question: How long does it take to issue a visa issuance certificate?
q2.answer: Generally takes 2 weeks to 1 month. Expedited processing may be possible for urgent cases.

q3.question: What should I do if my visa issuance certificate is rejected?
q3.answer: You can analyze the rejection reason, supplement additional documents, and reapply, or cancel the rejection disposition through administrative appeal.

page.title: Success Cases
page.description: Check out various success cases created with Sejoong Law Firm's expertise and know-how.

1.title: Real Estate Dispute Litigation Victory
1.description: Protected customer rights and achieved victory in a complex real estate contract dispute.
1.result: 50% increase in compensation, 30% reduction in litigation period
1.problem: During the real estate sale contract process, the seller violated the contract terms, causing a dispute. The customer paid the deposit, but the seller refused to transfer ownership and tried to cancel the contract.
1.solution: Sejoong Law Firm clearly proved the customer's rights through contract analysis, review of related laws, and evidence collection. We filed a lawsuit for contract performance with the court, and a professional lawyer team systematically proceeded with the case to receive a victory judgment.
1.timeline: Approximately 8 months from filing to judgment

2.title: Divorce Property Division Success
2.description: Maximized protection of customer rights and interests through fair property division.
2.result: 95% customer satisfaction, successful property division agreement
2.problem: During the divorce process, a dispute arose due to differences of opinion with the spouse regarding property division. No agreement was reached on the evaluation and division ratio of joint property.
2.solution: Sejoong Law Firm presented a fair property division plan through property list organization, evaluation, and presentation of legal grounds. We derived an agreement that both parties could be satisfied with through negotiation.
2.timeline: Approximately 3 months from consultation to agreement

3.title: Visa Rejection Reapplication Success
3.description: Successfully obtained visa through reapplication after visa rejection.
3.result: 100% reapplication success rate, reduced processing period
3.problem: The visa application was rejected, and there was insufficient explanation of the rejection reason. A specific plan for reapplication was needed.
3.solution: Sejoong Law Firm systematically proceeded with reapplication through rejection reason analysis, organization of necessary documents, and reapplication strategy development. We successfully obtained the visa through legal review by expert lawyers and administrative procedure guidance.
3.timeline: Approximately 2 months from reapplication to issuance

4.title: Corporate M&A Legal Advisory
4.description: Provided professional legal advisory during large-scale corporate merger and acquisition (M&A) process.
4.problem: Complex legal issues and risks arose during the large-scale corporate merger and acquisition process. Various legal reviews were needed, including contract review, confirmation of the legal status of the acquisition target company, and regulatory compliance.
4.solution: Sejoong Law Firm formed a dedicated lawyer team to provide legal advisory throughout the entire merger and acquisition process. We successfully completed the transaction through contract review, due diligence, regulatory compliance confirmation, and negotiation support.
4.timeline: Approximately 6 months from advisory start to transaction completion
